Rules.InvariantScript:
Table(
    { ChartItem: 1 , ChartValue: 120 },
    { ChartItem: 2 , ChartValue: 85 },
    { ChartItem: 3 , ChartValue: 150 },
    { ChartItem: 4 , ChartValue: 60 }, 
    { ChartItem: 5 , ChartValue: 120 },
    { ChartItem: 6 , ChartValue: 85 },
    { ChartItem: 7 , ChartValue: 150 },
    { ChartItem: 8 , ChartValue: 60 }, 
    { ChartItem: 9 , ChartValue: 120 },
    { ChartItem: 10 , ChartValue: 85 },
    { ChartItem: 11 , ChartValue: 150 },
    { ChartItem: 12 , ChartValue: 60 }
)

If( chrt_bar_month_h_v01.IsTrue_DarkMode ,
    If(
        IsBlank(chrt_bar_month_h_v01._selected_item_input), 
        Color.Transparent ,
        If(
            chrt_bar_month_h_v01._selected_item_input = ThisItem.ChartItem , ColorFade(chrt_bar_month_h_v01.Fill_BackGround,-60%), Color.Transparent
        )
    )
    ,
    If(
        IsBlank(chrt_bar_month_h_v01._selected_item_input), 
        Color.Transparent ,
        If(
            chrt_bar_month_h_v01._selected_item_input = ThisItem.ChartItem , ColorFade(ColorValue("#f65810"),95%), ColorFade(ColorValue("#e0e0e0"),95%)
        )
    )
)

If( chrt_bar_month_h_v01.IsTrue_DarkMode ,
    If( IsBlank(chrt_bar_month_h_v01._selected_item_input) , 
        ColorValue("#ffffff")
        ,
        If( chrt_bar_month_h_v01._selected_item_input = ThisItem.ChartItem , 
        ColorValue("#ffffff")
        ,
        ColorValue("#959595")
        )
    )
    ,
    If( IsBlank(chrt_bar_month_h_v01._selected_item_input) , 
        ColorValue("#222222")
        ,
        If( chrt_bar_month_h_v01._selected_item_input = ThisItem.ChartItem , 
        ColorValue("#000000")
        ,
        ColorValue("#959595")
        )
    )
)

If( IsBlank(chrt_bar_month_h_v01._selected_item_input) , 
    chrt_bar_month_h_v01.Size_Font*0.9,
    If( chrt_bar_month_h_v01._selected_item_input = ThisItem.ChartItem , 
    chrt_bar_month_h_v01.Size_Font,
    chrt_bar_month_h_v01.Size_Font*0.8
    )
)

If( IsBlank(chrt_bar_month_h_v01._selected_item_input) , 
    FontWeight.Semibold,
    If( chrt_bar_month_h_v01._selected_item_input = ThisItem.ChartItem , 
    FontWeight.Bold,
    FontWeight.Normal
    )
)

If( Or( chrt_bar_month_h_v01.IsTrue_DarkMode , chrt_bar_month_h_v01.IsTrue_DropShadow ) , false ,
If( bar_front_1.Width=0 , false , true))

If( chrt_bar_month_h_v01.IsTrue_DarkMode , 
    If( IsBlank(chrt_bar_month_h_v01._selected_item_input) , 
        ColorValue("#00E676")
        ,
        If( chrt_bar_month_h_v01._selected_item_input = ThisItem.ChartItem , 
        ColorValue("#00E676")
        ,
        ColorValue("#959595")
        )
    ), 
    If( IsBlank(chrt_bar_month_h_v01._selected_item_input) , 
        ColorValue("#f65810")
        ,
        If( chrt_bar_month_h_v01._selected_item_input = ThisItem.ChartItem , 
        ColorValue("#f65810")
        ,
        ColorValue("#959595")
        )
    )

)

If( IsBlank(chrt_bar_month_h_v01._selected_item_input) , 
    Parent.TemplateHeight/6*2
    ,
    If( chrt_bar_month_h_v01._selected_item_input = ThisItem.ChartItem , 
    Parent.TemplateHeight/6*2*1.2
    ,
    Parent.TemplateHeight/6*2*0.8
    )
)

If( chrt_bar_month_h_v01.IsTrue_DarkMode , false , 
    If( chrt_bar_month_h_v01.IsTrue_DropShadow , false,  true ))
